titleStmt.title: A pleasant discourse of court and wars with a replication to them both, and a commendation of all those that truly serue prince and countrie. Written by Thomas Churchyard, and called his Cherrishing.
titleStmt.author: Churchyard, Thomas, 1520?-1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ar. Hatfield, for William Holme,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
